descriptionHtml:
Better Gold (Skyrim) (Mesh and Texture Replacer) v1.21
--------------------------------------------

G\'day Elderscrollers.

Those who remember my first Oblivion mod will possibly be amused by this, my first (pointless) mod for Skyrim....

Better gold coin textures, based on the coin from the Collector\'s Edition of Oblivion.

You now have a choice of downloading either the Antique or Gilt Gold versions separately using the NMM or downloading both versions together for manual installation. Note - you can only use one version or the other - the combined download merely gives you the option of swapping between them (manually) if you so wish.


Version History
---------------

v1.01	-
Made it more yellow

v1.2	-
Reduce coin size to 90%
Flipped UV so the Talos Dragon symbol shows uppermost
Tweaked UV mapping
Made it shiny!
Included both \'antique\' and \'gilt gold\' versions in archive

v1.21 - 
Separate downloads available for antique and gilt gold versions


Installation
------------

Manual - (Combined download)
On extraction you will have 2 folders - Gilt and Antique. Open the folder for the version you require and move the folders (Meshes and textures) to your skyrim/data folder (click \'yes to overwrite\' if necessary)



Credits
-------

Bethesda Softworks as always. TES games are my all time favourites.
Me :)


Usage
-----

For whatever purpose pleases you.



Chris aka VA aka VagabondAngel
author: VagabondAngel
